duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitoring Itron security applications using in-house tools
Developing automated incident response capabilities in Azure Sentinel
Automating and developing monitors with scripts such as Python and shell/PowerShell
Detonating malicious files, codes, and validating vulnerabilities
Supporting daily information security related tasks including evaluating phishing attacks and triaging security events
Participating in incident response exercises with colleagues throughout the organization and incorporating lessons-learned into existing security practices
Utilizing free training to earn Microsoft Azure Certifications
Supporting InfoSec projects, implementations, and compliance-related activities

education_certification.credential: Currently enrolled in an accredited university degree program working towards a bachelor’s degree in a related field (Information Technology or Cybersecurity highly preferred)
